p: In the areas with medium spread of epidemic (35 provinces mainly located in the Center-North), death increase due to the total causes in the period from February 20 to March 31 is much more contained: 47% are attributed to COVID-19 positive deaths. Finally, in the areas with a low spread of epidemic (34 provinces mostly located in the Center and in the South), deaths of the month of March 2020 are on average 1.8% lower than that of the last 5Â years.
